recipe.title: Peanut Butter Blueberry Frozen Yogurt Bites Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; plain greek yogurt, nonfat ; (285 g)
¼ cup ; peanut butter, plus 2 tablespoons ; (60 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, add the Greek yogurt and honey and stir to combine.
Transfer 3 tablespoons of the mixture into 6 lined muffin tins.
Microwave the peanut butter for 15 seconds. Spoon 1 tablespoon of the softened peanut butter over each yogurt cup.
Sprinkle blueberries over the yogurt cups.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, add the Greek yogurt and honey and stir to combine.
Transfer 3 tablespoons of the mixture into 6 lined muffin tins.
Microwave the peanut butter for 15 seconds.
Spoon 1 tablespoon of the softened peanut butter over each yogurt cup.
Sprinkle blueberries over the yogurt cups.
